snippet.title: MotoGP™22  Next-Gen Gameplay
snippet.description: We are happy to show you the first Official MotoGP™22 Gameplay! Take a look at what we have in store for you, including a brand new split-screen mode to engage in epic battles side by side with your friends and family! The challenge just got even more exciting with #MotoGP22!
